description: {"blocks":[{"key":"50qeo","text":"This is a protocol for running the Bruker pulse program \"projectpr1d\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66ct6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9mhc","text":"This pulse program was originally proposed in:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"degrk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"818ku","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cg4nn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"align":"","authors":"Le Guennec A, Tayyari F, Edison AS","can_edit":true,"date":1504569600,"doi":"https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.analchem.7b02354","guid":"FBFF1D4789E94FA4B25051B1FFED186A","id":0,"journal":"","protocol_guid":"","protocol_id":0,"title":"Alternatives to Nuclear Overhauser Enhancement Spectroscopy Presat and Carr-Purcell-Meiboom-Gill Presat for NMR-Based Metabolomics."}}}}
